enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: Budget Issues: Parties decided that the Secretariat, in consultation with interested Parties, will draft conclusions on budget performance for the biennium 2004-2005.
On the programme budget for 2006-2007, Parties decided to take note of revisions to the Secretariat`s work programme (FCCC/SBI/2005/INF.6).
